website_summaries.verdict: This extra-long screwdriver reaches out-of-the-way spots and can retrieve runaway screws. It's a good choice for computer repair, electricians, and mechanics.
pros: Constructed from chrome vanadium steel with chrome-plated satin finish that's resistant to corrosion
Choice of other lengths and multi-pack

customer_reviews.title: The handle has a perfect grip, even if your hand gets swetty the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a long Phillips Head screwdriver with a magnetic tip. It holds screws in place with it's magnetic tip. The handle has a perfect grip, even if your hand gets swetty the grip should be good. The handle has a hole in it big enough to put another screwdriver for leverage if you have a hard screw to remove. Good quality product, glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Invaluable Tool for Computer Assembly or Repair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put my computer together after a friend of mine shared his war stories with me. He told me that he would constantly lose screws in the case and couldn't tighten certain parts (e.g., motherboard) properly because of the hard to reach angles. I said screw it (hehe) and bought this bad boy. This screwdriver made putting my computer together an absolute breeze. Not only was I able to access hard to reach places, but I didn't have to worry about balancing the head of the screw on the screw driver before reaching it's destination. If a PC build or repair is in your future, save yourself the time and buy this awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Worried Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Kinda funny, but practical!
customer_reviews.text: My partner told his kids he wanted a long screwdriver for Christmas, so we ordered this. It is REALLY long and we laughed and rolled our eyes when it arrived. Three days later he installed the new kitchen faucet he got me for Christmas, and this tool was exactly what he needed!
customer_reviews.author: DoubleEll

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: If you've ever tried to adjust the headlights on a late-model car, you've likely run into the same thing I did - there is a very skinny hole down into which you have to poke a screwdriver to turn a small gear. The problem is, you have to have one that's long enough and slender enough to reach down that access hole to the adjuster gear. If so, this is the one you want. In the meantime you have a long screwdriver for any other job that requires a long reach. Or I guess you could use it for making shish kebabs, or drilling for oil, or sword fighting with pirates.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Trusty longboi - it functions
customer_reviews.text: It's a magnetic tip screwdriver. I used it for a PC build, it proved very helpful during the build, and the magnetic tip is strong enough for most purposes. If you need a foot-long magnetic-tipped screwdriver, I'd recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: For Those Hard to Reach Phillips Screws
customer_reviews.text: I had to remove and replace the kitchen faucet on my travel trailer. There were 2 screws on my old faucet that I was fortunate to get out but because I had such an issue reaching the screws I determined I needed a longer handled screwdriver. Installing my new faucet which had 3 screws going through a plate was much easier with this long handled phillips.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I know it's supposed to be for hard-to-reach screws, but I find I'm actually using this for even regular screws. The grip is great, good diameter, comfortable, lets you get a good grip and apply good torque to the screw.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I somehow misplaced the screwdriver that I previously used for my massive Noctua NH-D14 heatsink. All my current screwdrivers were simply too thick to get inside and unscrew it. This screwdriver ended up being significantly longer than expected but it did the job of removing the heatsink and then screwing it into a new motherboard.
customer_reviews.author: PvtHudson

customer_reviews.title: Ah addition to my tool box
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this for heavy work so I can not tell anyone if they will survive abuse. But for general electronic repairs, etc opening cases/cabinets where the extra length is needed this fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Light Feather

customer_reviews.title: When you need to reach deep.
customer_reviews.text: I needed this screwdriver to open up a speaker cabinet that had a couple of screws in VERY deep holes. This screwdriver was exactly what I needed. A nice tool to have in my toolbox from now on too.
customer_reviews.author: GD Buerky

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This screw drivers drops screws all the time, tiny screws even so it's hardly magnetic.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Vladic

customer_reviews.title: Be careful not to bend it
customer_reviews.text: I got this to adjust headlights. The only way to reach the adjustment screw was with this screwdriver. Be aware this screwdriver shaft is fairly easily bent. It makes sense because its so long, but it would be nicer if it was stiffer/harder to bend or flexible but would go back to straight.
customer_reviews.author: DutchyMontana

customer_reviews.title: Good Basic Tool; Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: A good product shipped fast. You’ll probably use the 12” working length more than you think. The handle is comfortable with a solid grip. I had the need to pound on the handle using the screw driver as a makeshift drift. Worked well and showed no damage. Not recommended to use as a drift or pry bar, but it demonstrates the potential quality and longevity.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pettey

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic and sturdy. Nothing bad to say.
customer_reviews.text: Great grip. Long and thin enough to get into the smaller spots. The magnetic tip is invaluable especially for its use in long spaces where a little help is needed to fish out a magnetic screw from tight places.
customer_reviews.author: LINY

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic tip failure.
customer_reviews.text: While the screwdriver is good, magnetic part is a joke. The magnetic part quit working very soon after purchase. That’s disappointing because I need that to work to run screws down a buffer tube on an airsoft rifle.
customer_reviews.author: scarecrow

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for the applications I have utilized it in. Handle allows me to apply proper torque comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Malicki

customer_reviews.title: Great for computer builds
customer_reviews.text: I love the screwdriver, long reach and works great for putting screws in the motherboard among other things around the house. Feels like good quality
customer_reviews.author: Mike N.

customer_reviews.title: It just works.
customer_reviews.text: Its a good screwdriver, the magnet tip is strong and this thing can reach anywhere. Got it for a deep case PC build, was not disappointed. But it can be a little too long sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Kashta Coulter

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Longer than i expected, I don't know how I've made it this far in life without a magnetic screwdriver but this does very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not magnetic
customer_reviews.text: This screwdriver is not magnetic as advertised I should have returned it
customer_reviews.author: dg

customer_reviews.title: Quality tool
customer_reviews.text: Need these to adjust headlamps on my Hyundai. Adjustment cross head gear is about 8 inches down through a 3/8" hole in frame. This driver has length to spare. Makes the job a piece of cake.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tool
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly the screwdriver that I needed. The magnetic tip works very well in maintaining control of the screw when put screws in very deep spaces.
customer_reviews.author: B. Powell

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I uh miscalculated how long a foot is. wanted it for working on computers. it held the screws just fine and aloud me to use two hands which worked out well.
customer_reviews.author: Power User

customer_reviews.title: excellent tool
customer_reviews.text: The long handle, well padded, comfortable, as well as superior steel construction offers leverage and reach. A bonus is the magnetized head to hold small philipps screws.
customer_reviews.author: Peter M. Herford

customer_reviews.title: Long screw has Great quality and a magnetic tip
customer_reviews.text: Needed a long Phillips screwdriver to adjust my headlights, I am very pleased. Great quality and the best of all it has a magnetic tip which comes in very handy at times. Definitely would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete order
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic screwdriver at a good price. Amazon is the best place to buy. Great customer service department.

customer_reviews.title: got the wrong item and/or misleading!
customer_reviews.text: got the wrong item, from the pictures and reviews it looks like u get a phillips head screwdriver it even says it in the title and i got a flat head screwdriver that looks sloppy! definitely will be returning
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Long, Strong Magnet
customer_reviews.text: Used it to build my computer. Best screwdriver I've ever bought.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: This thing is nice. Very nice build and good grip. Never had an easier time building my system, to get in those hard to reach parts.

customer_reviews.title: Long enough to reach
customer_reviews.text: I needed this to take the cover off of my wife's scooter batteries. Did the job.

customer_reviews.title: the right choice...
customer_reviews.text: I like a good quality tools...and this one was used to install and secure the 60 inch TV set (hard to reach a safety locking screw with a short (9 inch ) screwdriver)
customer_reviews.author: Cassy

customer_reviews.title: Should be in everyones tool kit.
customer_reviews.text: Easily reaches into areas where it is difficult to reach with shorter tools. And appears to be well made.

customer_reviews.title: useful
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a must-buy for people who are building their own PC. It is useful for getting into tight corners because of how long it is.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice long philips head screw driver.  It works well
customer_reviews.text: It is a strong screw driver, works well, does not slip and good handle.
customer_reviews.author: gasmith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a screw into the garbage disposal jam for a couple of days,i receive my magnetic screwdriver today and in 5 seconds its done,perfect thank you guys 👍well done

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Has just the right reach for the job I had to do.

customer_reviews.title: it is long and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: it is a screwdriver! It works... not sure what else to say, I like it

customer_reviews.text: repaired an AC unit, couldn't find anything longer than a 9" at HD

customer_reviews.title: Way cheaper than the dealer
customer_reviews.text: Dealer wants $120 to replace the cabin filter. The filter is about twenty bucks. With this long screwdriver and a YouTube video I did it myself in about 15 minutes.

customer_reviews.title: Worked as needed
customer_reviews.text: Needed a super long screw driver to adjust the headlights on my 2012 F350. Worked like a charm.

customer_reviews.text: This screw was so helpful to build my custom pc. Long screwdriver helps to reach screws much easier than before.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for working on computers
customer_reviews.text: Ex: Screwing a motherboard in. Pretty much everybody I work on computers with has bought one because of me.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very useful, comfortable handle and good magnet, 1.25 inch screw shown on picture

customer_reviews.text: Magnetic and long. Great for getting screws in places where a short screw driver struggles. I do recommend

customer_reviews.text: It's a 12" phillips #2 screwdriver. What else is there to say? Feels good in my hand.

product_meta.title: Phillips Screwdriver QM-STVR 12 Inches Long Screwdriver Length Shank Screwdriver Magnetic Tip Cross Head Number 2 Screwdriver
feature_bullets: Screwdriver made of chrome vanadium steel and rubber,Chrome vanadium steel with corrosion resistant satin finish,premium chrome plated for smooth feel and corrosion resistance.
Phillips head screwdriver with magnetic works well for computer case，TV and other housings with Phillips head screws,the magnetic tip came in handy for placing screws in suitably tight spaces.
Phillips tip screwdriver size is #2 x 12",It was the perfect size and length for the job,the long length that allows you to reach into hard to get places.
Ergonomic non slip rubber handle improved comfort and control.tip is precision,precise tip ensure more secure fit.
Magnetic tip cross head screwdriver useful to open up electronic device, preferred for electrician, mechanic and repair shop.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars247 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
